qas.question: How much money did the Football League receive in revenues from television money for a two year agreement in 1986?

answers.text: the Football League received £6.3 million for a two-year agreement in 1986

qas.question: In 1998, the deal was renewed for what amount over four years?

answers.text: deal was renewed in 1988, the price rose to £44 million over four years.

qas.question: In 1988, how many clubs threateded to leave and form another league?

answers.text: ten clubs threatened to leave and form a "super league"

qas.question: Why did some of the top teams consider leaving the Football league?

answers.text: to capitalise on the growing influx of money being pumped into the sport.

In 1988, how much was the two year deal worth?
